name: Discovery Practice
description: Templates for various discovery-related billing entries including document review, interrogatories, and depositions

templates.description: Review and analyze [X] pages of documents produced by plaintiff in response to discovery requests to identify relevant information and potential evidence.
Draft [X] interrogatories to plaintiff regarding [specific topic] to obtain relevant information and admissions.
Prepare for deposition of [witness name] by reviewing relevant documents, case law, and preparing comprehensive outline of questions.
Conduct deposition of [witness name] regarding [specific topics] and obtain sworn testimony for use in litigation.
Review and analyze transcript of [witness name] deposition to identify key testimony and prepare for summary judgment motion.
Draft requests for production of documents from plaintiff regarding [specific categories] to obtain relevant evidence.
Review and respond to plaintiff's discovery requests by preparing objections and responses to interrogatories and requests for production.
